Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oose2015.cwang107.hareandhounds.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A board class which holds basic board info for each game
    Author:
    chenwang

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(java.lang.String gameId,
             java.lang.String firstPlayerType)
        Constructor, which can build the initial board position
        Parameters:
        gameId - game id
        firstPlayerType - record the type of first player, which is choose before the user start the game

      • Board

        public Board(java.lang.String gameId,
             java.lang.String firstPlayerType,
             int hound1_x,
             int hound1_y,
             int hound2_x,
             int hound2_y,
             int hound3_x,
             int hound3_y,
             int hare_x,
             int hare_y)
        Another contructor which is used by restart. When the server restarts, to persist across server restarts, this constructor is called to reconstruct the previous board status according to the database info
        Parameters:
        gameId - game id
        firstPlayerType - the player type of the first player
        hound1_x - x of hound1
        hound1_y - y of hound1
        hound2_x - x of hound2
        hound2_y - y of hound2
        hound3_x - x of hound3
        hound3_y - y of hound3
        hare_x - x of hare
        hare_y - y of hare

    • Method Detail

      • getBoard

        public int[][] getBoard()
        Get board positions info
        Returns:
        positions info

      • getGameId

        public java.lang.String getGameId()
        Get gameID
        Returns:
        game id

      • getDifferentPieceType

        public java.lang.String getDifferentPieceType()
        Because we record the first player type, this method would return the other type
        Returns:
        return "Hare" if first is "HOUND", return "HOUND" if first is "HARE"

      • changeBoard

        public void changeBoard(int fromX,
                        int fromY,
                        int toX,
                        int toY,
                        int value)
        set from point as 0, and to point as new value
        Parameters:
        fromX - the x-coordinate of start point
        fromY - the y-coordinate of start point
        toX - the x-coordinate of destination
        toY - the y-coordinate of destination
        value - indicates it is hare or hound

      • getBoards

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getBoards()
        get boards appearnce times as hash table
        Returns:
        a hash table which contains how many times each board position appears
